errors.title: Water Pressure Switch Open
errors.meaning: Detected open water pressure switch during operation.
errors.fix: Verify pump flow and pressure switch continuity (closed when pump is on).

errors.title: Air Flow Switch Fault
errors.meaning: Air flow switch detected open when blower is running.
errors.fix: Check blower operation and tubing for blockage. Replace AFS if no continuity during blower run.

errors.title: High Limit Switch Fault
errors.fix: Check for restricted water flow or faulty high-limit sensor. Replace if open below 135°F.

errors.title: Auto Gas Shutoff Fault
errors.meaning: Detected excessive combustion temperature or gas valve safety lockout.
errors.fix: Allow unit to cool. Inspect airflow and gas valve function. Replace AGS if fault persists.

errors.title: Water Temperature Sensor (Thermistor) Error
errors.meaning: Water temperature sensor open or shorted.
errors.fix: Check resistance (10kΩ at 77°F). Replace if out of range.

errors.title: Water Temperature Sensor (Thermistor) Error
errors.fix: Same as E01: verify resistance and replace if open or shorted.

errors.title: Stack Flue Sensor Fault
errors.meaning: Stack flue temperature exceeded limit or sensor failed.
errors.fix: Check exhaust path for blockage and measure SFS resistance (~10kΩ at 77°F). Replace sensor if faulty.

errors.title: Stack Flue Sensor Fault
errors.meaning: Duplicate E05 — overheat or sensor failure.

errors.title: Ignition Failure
errors.meaning: No flame detected after ignition attempt.
errors.fix: Verify 120V to igniter, clean flame sensor, check gas supply and ignition control.

errors.title: Bad Board
errors.fix: Cycle power to reset. Replace main control board if fault persists.
